pages.title: Torment Scroll
pages.text: A $(item)Torment Scroll$() contains the instructions to perform the Ritual used to summon a $(l:creatures/lord_of_torment)Lord of Torment$(/l). These scrolls are rare, but $(creatures/imp)Flame Imps$(/l) have been known to possess and gift them, sometimes.$(br)Using the scroll is enough to start the ritual, and in case of incorrect steps, the scroll will notify the player.$(br)For example, the player must stand in the dead center of a $(dimensions/stone_circle)Stone Circle$(/l).
